subject: 1" yellow bushings
description_text:

conversations.body_text: Hi Jim Rowledge,    We apologize for not fully understanding your needs. Please provide an image.

Hello,
I have a set of pedals (not yours) that I really like, but I keep
destroying the bushings on the slave cylinder for the brakes. I bought your
kit off of Amazon and I really like the feel of the 1" tall yellow bushing.
Can you sell me some spares seperately or tell me where I can source them?
Thank you
Jim Rowledge
